title: 2. The land specified in the Schedule is exempt from the provisions of Part
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Land Development Agency Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Land Development Agency Act 2021 

(Part 9 Exemption) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited land development agency act 2021 (part 9 exemption) order 2024

title: 2. The land specified in the Schedule is exempt from the provisions of Part
heading: 2. The land specified in the Schedule is exempt from the provisions of Part
text_raw:
2. The land specified in the Schedule is exempt from the provisions of Part 

9 of the Land Development Agency Act 2021 (No. 26 of 2021). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

Aungier Street Campus, Dublin 2. 

[295] 3 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [295] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 

21 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
